properties.name: nts.security.oauth2.client.configuration.roles-claim
properties.description: The claim name in JWT access token, that hold granted roles/groups of current user.

properties.name: nts.security.oauth2.client.configuration.role-prefix
properties.description: The role/group prefix, filter only the authority that starts with the prefix.

properties.name: nts.security.oauth2.client.configuration.reverse-order-of-display-name
properties.description: If true the display name is {lastName} {firstName}, else the display name is {firstName} {lastName}

properties.name: nts.helper.location.enabled
properties.description: If true then the NtsLocationHelper bean is created.

properties.name: nts.helper.location.provider
properties.description: The location helper provider name. Available values is keycloak.

properties.name: nts.helper.location.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable redis cache or not, default true

properties.name: nts.helper.location.cache.key-prefix
properties.description: The prefix of redis cache keys

properties.name: nts.helper.location.keycloak.client-registration-id
properties.description: The oauth2 client registration id, that must be configured in spring.security.oauth2.registration.{client-registration-id}.* properties.

properties.name: nts.helper.location.keycloak.admin-base-url
properties.description: The base url of keycloak admin restful api. Ex: http://localhost:9080/admin/realms/nts

properties.name: nts.helper.location.keycloak.internal-client-id
properties.description: The keycloak internal id of the client, that setup locations as client scopes.

properties.name: nts.helper.location.keycloak.custom-attribute-keys
properties.description: The list of custom attribute keys. The key must match with client role attribute key.

properties.name: nts.helper.location.keycloak.bit-set-claim
properties.description: The name of claim that present granted location ids in format of bitset. The bit 0 present grant all locations. The bit {number} present location with id = {number}.
